question:
Which of the following are the advantages of ADR (Alternative Dispute Resolution) summarized by the Law Commission of India?
1. Less expensive
2. Time-consuming & effective
3. Parties are free to discuss their differences of opinion
4. Parties have the feeling that there is no losing or winning side
Select the correct option from the codes given below:
explanation: The following are the advantages of ADR (Alternative Dispute Resolution) summarized by the Law Commission of India: (1) the process is less expensive, (2) it less time-consuming, (4) parties are free to discuss their differences of opinion and (4) parties have the feeling that there is no losing or winning side.
